reviews.text: My first time eating rabbit and I really liked it a lot, the texture, the flavour, the plums and accompanied with fries, uff simply delicious. The attention was very good, they were very kind and fast. I recommend them if they go to Brussels üá©üá™‚ù§Ô∏èüëå
Small place obviously, but just right with the atmosphere and vibe is very upscale without the ticket! Our second time before leaving town, definitely recommend!!!
Excellent atmosphere, excellent food and drink, excellent value. We hadn't booked and staff were absolutely fantastic...everything was so good we went back the next night.

The service wasn't bad, we were seated and had our orders taken quickly, and the staff was amicable too. The problems started when the food came. I ordered the Ravioli filled with ricotta and spinach, which was 21 euro. I could've excused the price, if it weren't for the fact that the plate had only 4 pieces of ravioli (albeit bigger than normal, but not enough to feed one person; i was still hungry when i left) and it came with a sauce that wasn't even mentioned in the menu.

The infrastructure is really nice and well designed. The service was good too. The food was well made. The carpaccio was with a special spicy taste. The beef was overcooked in some parts, but still good. The salmon was perfect! They have a very good Thai tea! The ice cream is was pure and sugar and they need to improve the gluten free options. But the restaurant is super nice! Congratulations.
